nodes.text: Jaris Kan was a male Devaronian kallak assassin who was active around the time of the Force Wars in the Tython system. In 25,793 BBY, he was hired by Baron Garto, a crime lord of the Nine Houses ruling Shikaakwa, in order to assassinate the Baron Volnos Ryo, a rival of Gorto. During his attempt Kan was confronted by Tasha Ryo, the Je'daii daughter of Volnos, and subsequently killed by the Twi'lek Baron.
